author: Staff Reporter
text: Due to the urgent maintenance work to be carried out in 110/22 KV Kurumbapet sub-station, power supply to the following areas including HT consumers between 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Tuesday on March 1, 2016 shall interrupted in the following areas: Navarkulam, Annie Besant Nagar, Lawspet Government Quarters, All Education Institutions in Lawspet, Ashok Nagar, Karuvadikuppam, Kamaraj Nagar, Samipillaithottam, Shanmugapuram, Kadirkamam, Thilagar Nagar, Mohan Nagar, S.B.I Colony, Avvai Nagar, Kuruniji Nagar, Thattanchavady, Jeevananthapuram, Jipmer Hospital and Quarters, Gorimedu Police Quarters, Krishna Nagar, Lawspet, Pethuchettypet, Muthirapalayam, Dharmapuri, Iyyankutipalayam, Kurumbapet Housing Board, Kurumbapet Industrial Estate and surrounding areas.
title: 29FEBPYSSM05 Brief
